snippet.title: Former Ipswich mayor Paul Pisasale facing more charges amid CCC investigation
snippet.content: Former Ipswich Mayor, Paul Pisasale is set to face court on charges of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The 65-year-old is currently on bail on three separate charges, including extortion and assault. Mr Pisasale resigned as mayor in June amid a Crime and Corruption Commission investigation into an incident in which he was found at Melbourne airport carrying $50,000 cash. More to come.
